jobs.title: React Front-End Developer
jobs.description:
What we’re looking for:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Front-End Developer to join our innovative team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing user-facing features using React.js and Next.js, ensuring our applications are robust, scalable, and deliver an exceptional user experience. You possess creativity, flexibility, and a passion for crafting elegant software interfaces.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement high-quality web applications using React.js and Next.js.
Build and enhance user-facing features with a strong focus on performance and scalability.
Utilize ES6/JavaScript programming language proficiently.
Integrate and manage state using Redux.js within React.js applications.
Work with RESTful APIs to build and maintain web applications.
Debug and resolve issues across our applications, ensuring optimal performance.
Identify, evaluate, and communicate front-end best practices.
Collaborate closely with design and backend teams to create seamless customer-facing interfaces.
Contribute to the conception, development, and maintenance of new features and enhancements.
Share diverse perspectives and innovative ideas to drive the project forward.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in front-end development technologies: JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, CSS, React/Redux.
Strong proficiency in ES6/JavaScript programming language.
Proficiency in state management with Redux, including actions, reducers, and the Redux store.
Comprehensive understanding of web standards, browser functionality, HTML semantics, and familiarity with APIs.
Strong understanding of UI/UX best practices and considerations.
Proven ability to debug and resolve issues effectively.
Proficient in version control, branching models, git/Github workflows, and PR review cycles.
A portfolio showcasing consumer-facing or experience in SaaS products is a plus.
Ability to work harmoniously with design and backend teammates.
No military obligation for male candidates or deferred for at least two years.

This position is highly promising in terms of bringing great opportunities for personal career growth since there are many things to explore, try, and learn together.

Come and join us to create the promising & exciting future together!

company.name: Mini Course Generator
company.description:
UpdateTEST
Join Our Ed-Tech Start-Up For An Exciting Journey!

We're a SaaS startup in the ed-tech vertical, dedicated to enhancing the learning experience and simplifying the lives of educational content providers & creators. Since late 2017, we've launched four products, all still active and bringing a novel approach to their markets. We're proud of the expertise and insights we've accumulated in ed-tech over the years.


One of our products, the Mini Course Generator, is gaining traction worldwide, reflected by consecutive monthly growth rates. To achieve our ambitious goals, we're seeking a talented team player for the 'Customer Success' position. This is your chance to make a truly impactful contribution and join this exciting journey at an early stage.


Our office is located in METU Teknokent, which we believe is the best working environment in Ankara. Although this position is not suitable for a remote work, we embrace a hybrid working model.

What you can expect from us:

A competitive salary and benefits package.
A chance to be a key member of the core team, contributing directly to the product's success in the global market.
A friendly, and supportive working environment, including walks in the green surroundings of METU campus.
